Module thomasmccue.dbclientappreal
Package thomasmccue.dbclientapp.dao

Class CustomerDao

java.lang.Object
thomasmccue.dbclientapp.dao.CustomerDao
public class CustomerDao extends Object
This class manages the CRUD to the mysql database for Customer objects.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    addCust(Customer customer)
    This method adds customers to the client_schedule.customers table and to the ObservableList displayCust which is responsible for the display of customers on the landing page.
    static boolean
    deleteCust(Customer customer)
    Deletes a customer from the client_schedule.customers table in mySql and from the ObservableList displayCust.
    static int
    findCustAppts(int custId)
    Gets all appointments scheduled for a selected customer, and returns an integer indicating the number of appointments currently scheduled for the selected customer.
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer>
    getAllCust()
    Gets a list of all customers in the client_schedule.customers table.
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String>
    getAllCustId()
    Queries the client_schedule.customers table to retrieve an ObservableList of all existing customer IDs.
    static boolean
    updateCust(Customer customer, int index)
    Updates the customer with the same ID as the customer object it's passed in the client_schedule.customers table in mySql and in the ObservableList displayCust.Time values are explicitly set to UTC for storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerDao

      public CustomerDao()

  • Method Details

    • addCust

      public static boolean addCust(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      This method adds customers to the client_schedule.customers table and to the ObservableList displayCust which is responsible for the display of customers on the landing page. Time values are explicitly set to UTC for storage.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to be added
      Returns:
      boolean true/false whether add was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateCust

      public static boolean updateCust(Customer customer, int index) throws SQLException
      Updates the customer with the same ID as the customer object it's passed in the client_schedule.customers table in mySql and in the ObservableList displayCust.Time values are explicitly set to UTC for storage.
      Parameters:
      customer - customer to be updated
      index - location of customer to be updated in displayCust list
      Returns:
      boolean true/false update was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteCust

      public static boolean deleteCust(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Deletes a customer from the client_schedule.customers table in mySql and from the ObservableList displayCust. Calls findCustAppts method to and only allows delete if the selected customer has no appointments.
      Parameters:
      customer - appointment to delete
      Returns:
      boolean true/false whether delete was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • findCustAppts

      public static int findCustAppts(int custId)
      Gets all appointments scheduled for a selected customer, and returns an integer indicating the number of appointments currently scheduled for the selected customer. User by the deleteCust method to ensure that customers who have appointments scheduled can't be deleted until their appointments are.
      Parameters:
      custId - id of customer whose appointments need to be searched
      Returns:
      int representing the number of appointments scheduled for the customer

    • getAllCust

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCust()
      Gets a list of all customers in the client_schedule.customers table. Used to populate the ObservableList displayCust. Explictly converts time values to the systems defalut time zone for display purposes.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of all customers

    • getAllCustId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAllCustId()
      Queries the client_schedule.customers table to retrieve an ObservableList of all existing customer IDs.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of customer IDs
